name: S3SinkSpec
description:
S3SinkSpec configures S3-compatible object storage output.
Supports AWS S3, Cloudflare R2, MinIO, and other S3-compatible services.

fields.name: Bucket
fields.description: Bucket is the S3 bucket name.

fields.name: Region
fields.description: Region is the AWS region (optional, uses SDK defaults if not specified).

fields.name: Endpoint
fields.description: Endpoint is a custom endpoint URL for S3-compatible services (e.g., R2, MinIO).

fields.name: Prefix
fields.description:
Prefix is prepended to object keys. Supports variables:
- $JOB_NAME: The job's metadata.name
- $JOB_DATE_ISO8601: Current UTC time in ISO8601 basic format (20060102T150405Z) - recommended
- $JOB_DATE_RFC3339: Current UTC time in RFC3339 format (2006-01-02T15:04:05Z)

Note: $JOB_DATE_ISO8601 is recommended for S3 keys as RFC3339 contains colons
which require URL encoding.

fields.name: Credentials
fields.description: Credentials provides explicit credentials (optional, uses SDK credential chain if not specified).

fields.name: ForcePathStyle
fields.description: ForcePathStyle forces path-style addressing (required for MinIO and some S3-compatible services).
